LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_GrantStatAbilit: Grants the user the "{1}" buff, which passively improves their performance in the relevant skill.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_GrantThurmboBut: Grants the user the "{1}" buff, which doubles their butcher yields from thrumbos.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_GrantEpicureanW: Grants the user the "{1}" buff, which allows them to cook epicurean delights.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_MechDrops: This weapon makes the user unusually good at dismantling mechanoids. When they kill a mechanoid, it will drop extra steel, and possibly other things.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_InsectDrops: This weapon grants the user a supernatural instinct for finding extra insect jelly, which is dropped whenever they kill an insect. Just don't ask where it comes from.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_Thrumbocall: This {0} grants the user the "{1}" ability, which summons a thrumbo herd up to once a year. This effect has no impact on normal Thrumbo migration frequencies.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_APRocket: This {0} has a small grapeshot rocket jury-rigged onto its side, granting the "{1}" ability. This can be used once a day deal heavy damage to unarmored foes.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_EMPRocket: This {0} has a small EMP cannon jury-rigged onto its side, granting the "{1}" ability. This can be used once a day to immobolize a large cluster of mechanoids for significantly more time than other EMP weapons.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_KillstreakDR: While equipped, this {0}'s user enters a battle trance every time they kill something, granting damage resistance. Subsequent kills before it wears off will increase the effect.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_KillstreakFirer: While equipped, this {0}'s user enters a battle trance every time they kill something, granting improved fire rates and firing cooldown. Subsequent kills before it wears off will increase the effect.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_KillstreakSpeed: While equipped, this {0}'s user enters a battle trance every time they kill something, granting increased movespeed. Subsequent kills before it wears off will increase the effect.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_AttactTradeShip: This {0} has some special radio codes embroidered into it. Anyone wearing it can occasionally use these codes to attract a nearby merchant ship into trading range.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_TamingInspirati: This {0} contains the vestiges of an animal master's wisdom. A wearer can draw upon this wisdom to immediately gain a taming inspiration.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_CreativeInspira: This {0} contains a master crafter's insight. A wearer can draw upon this insight to immediately gain a creative inspirtion.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_ShootingInspira: The instincts of a peerless sniper are hewn into this {0}. A wielder can draw upon these instincts to grant a shooting inspiration to theirself and their companions.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_GrantHerdFeeder: Grants the user the "{1}" buff, which allows them to produce kibble with miraculous efficiency.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_Prospecting: This {0} grants the user the "{1}" ability, which can be used every few days to immediatly find an underground mineral deposit.
LanguageData.MooMF_AbilityDescription_KillstreakHeali: While equipped, this {0}'s user enters a battle trance every time they kill something, granting a huge natural healing boost. Old stories about this weapon claim that heartless warriors recoved from intense battles by killing their pets. But surely you wouldn't do that... would you?
